steps.title: Email Elon Musk directly through his White House email address.
steps.content: Email Elon Musk directly through his White House email address. As part of his position in the White House Office under Donald Trump, Musk has been assigned the email address erm71@who.eop.gov . This email address is the most direct way to contact Musk online. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Email
steps.content: Email Tesla’s sales or press address. If you have a question about sales for Elon Musk, you can try contacting him through the Tesla sales email: NAsales@teslamotors.com . If you have a press question or comment for Elon Musk, such as for a news article or story, you can try reaching him through the Tesla press email for North America: Press@tesla.com . [2] X Research source You can find a complete list of press email addresses on the Tesla contact page . You could also try to contact Musk through the email address of one of his other companies, such as info@spacex.com (SpaceX) or info@neuralink.com (Neuralink).

steps.title: Contact Musk on X (formerly Twitter).
steps.content: Contact Musk on X (formerly Twitter). Elon Musk is active on X and checks his account regularly. You can tweet him through his X handle @elonmusk or by accessing his X account here . [3] X Research source You will need to create an X account to tweet at him. To tweet him, write a message on X using 169 characters or less. Include @elonmusk in the message so he can be tagged in it and get a notification when you tweet your message. For example, you may tweet, "@elonmusk When can we expect affordable Tesla models for consumers?" or "@elonmusk Thank you for considering the environment when you make your products." [4] X Research source He can then respond to you on Twitter by tagging your Twitter handle and posting a message. [5] X Research source Consider following Musk on Twitter so you can stay up-to-date on his tweets and connect with him regularly. As of May 2025, Musk does not appear to have a public account on Facebook or Instagram. Previously, Musk could be contacted through the Instagram handle @elonmusk , although this account is now private and no longer verified as belonging to the businessman. Be wary of engaging with Facebook or Instagram accounts that are not verified as belonging to Elon Musk. These pages may be run by scammers, so it’s best to avoid any contact with them.

steps.title: Submit a question or comment on the Tesla website.
steps.content: Submit a question or comment on the Tesla website. Use the contact information on the official Tesla website, which can be found here . Depending on the reason for your message, you may need to send an email to a certain department or fill out an online form to get in touch with Customer Service. If you want to send a direct message to Tesla’s customer support team at this link , you’ll have to sign up for or log in to a Tesla account. If you send a message or email through the Tesla site, include a subject for your message and your comments. Keep the subject line short and to the point so Musk knows what your comments are about. Once you have filled in the form, you can submit it and wait for a response.

steps.title: Write a letter to Musk explaining your concerns or ideas.
steps.content: Write a letter to Musk explaining your concerns or ideas. Compose a short, one-page letter to Musk. Use a salutation like "Dear Elon Musk" or "Dear Mr. Musk." Then, outline your concerns, ideas, or thoughts in short paragraphs. End the letter with a sign off like "Your fan" or "A concerned consumer." When you write a letter to someone in authority, you should start with dear. You can write thank you if you have made a request and close the letter. If it is a simple communication, you can close the letter with something like, “Sending you wishes for a nice day.” You may handwrite the letter for a more personal touch or type it up so it is legible and easy to read.

steps.title: Mail the letter
steps.content: Mail the letter to the Tesla Board of Directors. Put the letter in an envelope and address it to "Elon Musk." Below the name, write: Corporate Secretary, Tesla, Inc. 3500 Deer Creek Road, Palo Alto, CA 94304 United States . [6] X Research source Make sure you include the correct postage so the letter gets to Tesla. Include a return address on the top right corner of the envelope so you can get a reply.

steps.title: Use social media to let Musk know you sent the letter.
steps.content: Use social media to let Musk know you sent the letter. He gets lots of mail every day. To make your letter stand out, try using Twitter to let him know you have sent it to him. Tweet a screenshot of your letter to his Twitter handle so he can see it. [7] X Research source You may include a short note on social media like, "Mr. Musk, I have sent you a letter full of great ideas for Tesla, please respond if you can!" or "Mr. Musk, here is a letter I sent you recently about my concerns around solar energy, please get back to me when you get the chance!"

steps.title: Call Elon Musk through one of his public company phone numbers.
steps.content: Call Elon Musk through one of his public company phone numbers. While Elon Musk’s personal phone number is not available to the public, you can try to get a message to him by calling one of his companies. For instance, you can call the SpaceX Starbase Launch Facility at 310-363-6000 , the Tesla Toll-Free number at (877) 798-3752 , or the Musk Foundation at 737-235-6956 . [8] X Research source
